scenario_text.value:
Man, am I bored. I wish we’d get attacked or
something.

Hey, don’t say things like that. I prefer not
getting attacked.
You don’t get it. Boredom is like poison.

It saps your will to live, slowly pulling you
towards death.
Stop creeping me out, would you?
Don’t let him get to you, Takuma.

He likes to mess with people, so he’ll say
random stuff and wait for a reaction.

Hey, that’s not fair! I very often mean every
word that I say!
And did you mean what you said just now?
Haha, well, it’s clear you two get along.

Anyway, don’t worry. When I get bored, I’m
the type that likes to amuse myself.
